[[Boomerang CEE+EMEA|Boomerang (Arab World)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Arab World''' is one of Turner's international branches. It is headquartered in [[Dubai]], [[United Arab Emerates]]. The company opened its office in 2010 to celebrate the launch of [[Cartoon Network (Arab World)]].{{cite news | title = Boomerang and TCM go Arabic | publisher = AMEinfo.com | date = 15 April 2008 | url = http://www.ameinfo.com/153473.html | accessdate = 2011-09-05}}{{cite news | title = Turner Broadcasting to boost Arabic TV content | publisher = mediaME | date = 01 August 2010 | url = http://mediame.com/news/media_business/turner_broadcasting_boost_arabic_tv_content | accessdate = 2011-09-05}}{{cite news | title = Turner Broadcasting to open Dubai office | publisher = UPI.com | date = 01 August 2010 | url = http://www.upi.com/Entertainment_News/Movies/2010/08/01/Turner-Broadcasting-to-open-Dubai-office/UPI-96651280663139/ | accessdate = 2011-09-05}} ==Channels== * [[Cartoon Network (Arab World)]] * [[Boomerang CEE+EMEA|Boomerang (Arab World)]] * [[Turner Classic Movies]] ==See also== * [[Cartoon Network Studios Arabia]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://europe.turnerinfo.com Turner Europe] * [http://www.turnermediainnovations.com Turner Media Innovations] * [http://www.cartoonnetworkarabic.com/ Cartoon Network (Arab World)] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Companies based in Dubai]] [[Category:Companies established in 2010]] [[Category:Media of Dubai]] [[Category:Media companies of the United Arab Emirates]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Arab World]]
